title: Add Google site verification meta tag to index.html

requirements.text: Add a `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="ajqPDh5gAwTpW4GTSstghaOCXr99GgBnovTx1Vckcag">` tag inside the `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html` to enable Google Search Console site verification.

quotes: Put this in the dns configuration google-site-verification=ajqPDh5gAwTpW4GTSstghaOCXr99GgBnovTx1Vckcag

acceptanceCriteria: The `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html` contains exactly `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="ajqPDh5gAwTpW4GTSstghaOCXr99GgBnovTx1Vckcag">`.
All existing SEO metadata tags (description, Open Graph, Twitter Card, keywords, theme-color, robots) remain intact and unmodified.
The page title and all other existing head elements are preserved.

constraints: Do not modify any other tags or content in frontend/index.html beyond adding the google-site-verification meta tag.
Do not make any backend changes.
